bibl.title: The Evolving Shape of the Papyrus Collection in Geneva.
Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: Outlines the most important links between the Geneva papyrus collection and other collections in the world. - The holdings of the papyrus collection at Geneva library. - Fitting the pieces together. Edition of P. Gen. Inv. 399, which is the lower half of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 31497 (= S.B. VI, 9283). Contract of loan. Arsinoïton Polis (Ptolemaïs Euergetis), May 11, AD 556. [A full publication of the contract will be produced under the heading P. Gen. IV, 194.]

bibl.idno: P. Gen. Inv. 399 + P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 31497
